attributes.action: To award a large honour immediately to veterans over 110+ who served during World War I, this should not wait until the New Year because they might not be alive then
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are our treasured veterans and they deserve awards (more so than a lot of people I can think of!)

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
